original_text: Next to them, repairs were made by men from Gibeon and Mizpah—Melatiah of Gibeon and Jadon of Meronoth—places under the authority of the governor of Trans-Euphrates.
korean_text: 그 다음은 기브온 사람 믈라댜와 메로놋 사람 야돈이 강 서쪽 총독의 관할에 속한 기브온 사람들 및 미스바 사람들과 더불어 중수하였고

sentences.original_text: Next to them, repairs were made
by men from Gibeon and Mizpah
Melatiah of Gibeon and Jadon of Meronoth
sentences.korean_translation: 기브온 사람 믈라댜와 메로놋 사람 야돈이
